edu.cuny.ai.learning
Class SoftmaxLearnerWithDiscount

java.lang.Object
  edu.cuny.ai.learning.AbstractLearner
      edu.cuny.ai.learning.SoftmaxLearner
          edu.cuny.ai.learning.SoftmaxLearnerWithDiscount
All Implemented Interfaces:
DiscreteLearner, ExposedStimuliResponseLearner, Learner, StimuliResponseLearner, Parameterizable, Prototypeable, Resetable, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
public class SoftmaxLearnerWithDiscount
extends SoftmaxLearner

This is deprecated. Please use NArmedBanditLearner with SoftmaxActionChoosingPolicy and AdaptiveReturnUpdatingPolicy (with WidrowHoffLearner) instead. It is moved from the source and left here for test purposes.

A learner that implements the softmax algorithm for n-armed bandit problem described in Section 2.3, Sutton and Barto's RL book.

temperature is constant when alpha is 1, or reducing down to mintemperature when alpha is less than 1.

Parameters

base.discount
double (0, 1) (not discounting by default)		 (the discounting factor)

Default Base

softmax_learner

Version:
$Revision: 1.1 $
Author:
Jinzhong Niu
